thread.title: Vaani Kapoor to romance Ranveer Singh in Aditya Chopra's 'Befikre'
thread.title_full: Vaani Kapoor to romance Ranveer Singh in Aditya Chopra's 'Befikre' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Vaani Kapoor to romance Ranveer Singh in Aditya Chopra's 'Befikre'
text:
After days of speculation, it has finally been confirmed that 'Shuddh Desi Romance' actress Vaani Kapoor will star opposite actor Ranveer Singh in Aditya Chopra's 'Befikre'. mid-day had reported about Vaani Kapoor being roped in for the film on Oct 6. *(Read the story here) **Vaani Kapoor. Pic/Santa Banta*
Yash Raj Films ... Â»
